title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 61.5 - Dental laboratory prescriptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 61.5 - Dental laboratory prescriptions

State Regulations
A dental prescription for furnishing, constructing, reproducing or repairing prosthetic dentures or bridges to be used and worn as
substitutes for natural teeth, or orthodontic or other appliance used for the
correction of malocclusion or deformities of other structures, shall comply
with the provision of subdivision (1) of section
6611
of the

Education Law, and shall contain the following information: (a) the name of the laboratory to which the
prescription is addressed; (b) the
date on which it is written; (c) a
clear description of the work to be done, with appropriate diagrams if
necessary; (d) a clear
specification of the character of materials to be used; and
(e) the signature and license number of the
dentist. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
61.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
